column5: hello all i was out again last night and after a 15 min walk   lol my 4 wheeler comes out when we get another 2",anyway i spudded 2 holes approx 20' apart and started fishing,wasn't long and BANG 11" perch after tossing it back i walked over to the other hole and dropped her down,fished 5-6 mins and BANG missed it son of a gun tooker on the drop. i through another minnow on and gave it another 5 mins.....nothing so i went back to the first hole jig her 3 times,big high 3' jigs cause the night before they took it on the drop and this night as well so thats a pattern i wanted to stay with,the 3rd big jig my line started going to the side of the hole so i took up the slack and drove that 3/0 treble hook right to it  hey a nice fat 3 1/2lber,heres a pic,not a bite after that,i think with the overcast and snow the darn eyes bit early oh well tonight ill go early  .  Hawg Hunter
dang, I need to move to Belleville ...nice going

Well done...our first ice-fishing report !!!!!....glad to hear that there is some safe ice  ,and it wont be long now till everone will be out,congrats on that nice walleye !!!..nice pic as well...cheers
Wow not bad for the little efforts put in. Think you are right get out a bit earlier and see what happens.
Congrats on the successful day on the Ice... funny how there are eyes being caught on ice and out of boats in the BOQ lol
